activities.name: condition
activities.description:
초기 적재 파이프라인 PIP_D_CD_GODOMALL_INIT 호출시 
증분주기값 넘어옴

query.value:
select b.pg_table_name, a.es_table_name, a.period::int as period
  from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_master a
      inner join ( select distinct pg_table_name, es_table_name 
                     from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master                    
                 ) b                
                on 
                 ( a.es_table_name = b.es_table_name)
where @{variables('condition')}

select string_agg('{  "source": { "path": "['''||a.es_column_name||''']" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.pg_column_name||'", "type": "'||a.objtype||'" } }' ,',') as json
   from (
		  select a.es_column_name , a.pg_column_name , case when b.udt_name = 'numeric' then 'Decimal'
		                                                   else  'String'
		                                                end as objtype                                                                         
		    from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master as a inner join information_schema.columns b
		                                              on (
		                                                     a.pg_table_name||'_temp' = b.table_name
		                                                 and a.pg_column_name = b.column_name 
		                                                 and b.table_schema ='cd_ods'
		                                                 )       
		   where a.pg_table_name ='@{item().pg_table_name}'
		) a

activities.name: table_list
activities.description: 정웝이샵 테이블과 적재되는 pg테이블 리스트 ( temp )

query.value:
select b.pg_table_name, a.es_table_name, a.period::int as period
  from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_master a
      inner join ( select distinct pg_table_name, es_table_name 
                     from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master                    
                 ) b                
                on 
                 ( a.es_table_name = b.es_table_name)  
where a.es_table_name ='@{pipeline().parameters.pip_estable}'

select string_agg('{  "source": { "path": "['''||a.es_column_name||''']" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.pg_column_name||'", "type": "'||a.objtype||'" } }' ,',') as json
   from (
		  select a.es_column_name , a.pg_column_name , case when b.udt_name = 'numeric' then 'Decimal'
		                                                   else  'String'
		                                                end as objtype                                                                         
		    from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master as a inner join information_schema.columns b
		                                              on (
		                                                     a.pg_table_name||'_temp' = b.table_name
		                                                 and a.pg_column_name = b.column_name 
		                                                 and b.table_schema ='cd_ods'
		                                                 )       
		   where a.pg_table_name ='@{item().pg_table_name}'
		) a

select b.pg_table_name, a.es_table_name, a.period::int as period
  from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_master a
      inner join ( select distinct pg_table_name, es_table_name 
                     from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master
                 ) b                
                on 
                 ( a.es_table_name = b.es_table_name)
where @{variables('condition')}

select string_agg('{  "source": { "path": "['''||a.es_column_name||''']" }, "sink": {  "name": "'||a.pg_column_name||'", "type": "'||a.objtype||'" } }' ,',') as json
   from (
		  select a.es_column_name , a.pg_column_name , case when b.udt_name = 'numeric' then 'Decimal'
		                                                   else  'String'
		                                                end as objtype                                                                         
		    from cd_ods.tb_jweshop_table_mapping_master as a inner join information_schema.columns b
		                                              on (
		                                                     a.pg_table_name||'_temp' = b.table_name
		                                                 and a.pg_column_name = b.column_name 
		                                                 and b.table_schema ='cd_ods'
		                                                 )       
		   where a.pg_table_name ='@{item().pg_table_name}'
		) a

activities.name: set condition

초기 적재 파이프라인 PIP_D_CD_GODOMALL_INIT 호출시 
증분주기값 넘어옴

properties.description:
- 초기 적재시, 월별로 모든 파일 Sink
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMM 형태

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT DISTINCT(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') AS CALMONTH FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema, '.', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE ', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ' = ', item().CALMONTH)

properties.description:
- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMM 형태
- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요

- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성
- 증분컬럼이 YYYYMM 형태
- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요

query.value:
INSERT INTO @{pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SinkTable}
(
 order_detail_id          
  ,bid_detail_id            
	,bidid                    
	,docid                    
	,orgname                  
	,sheet                    
	,name                     
	,spec                     
	,unit                     
	,temp_cnt                 
	,comp_div                 
	,prod_cd                  
	,standard                 
	,work_dt                  
	,mapping_cd               
	,productlevel_cd          
	,price_cd                 
	,cnt               
	,chk_prod_id              
	,chk_prod_dt              
	,chk_prod_flag            
	,system_prod_ch_yn      
)
SELECT order_detail_id          
    ,bid_detail_id            
	,bidid                    
	,docid                    
	,orgname                  
	,sheet                    
	,name                     
	,spec                     
	,unit                     
	,temp_cnt                 
	,comp_div                 
	,prod_cd                  
	,standard                 
	,work_dt                  
	,mapping_cd               
	,productlevel_cd          
	,price_cd                 
	,cnt               
	,chk_prod_id              
	,chk_prod_dt              
	,chk_prod_flag            
	,system_prod_ch_yn      
FROM @{pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SinkTable}_TEMP
WHERE bidid NOT IN ( SELECT distinct bidid from @{pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.SinkTable} );

select 1 as ss;

properties.description: - 초기 적재시, 월별로 모든 파일 Sink

preCopyScript.value:
delete 
from cd_ods.bw_azep_o00000_full 
where calday between to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' - interval '1 months'), 'YYYYMMDD')
                 and  to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' - interval '0 months') - interval '1 day', 'YYYYMMDD');

delete 
from cd_ods.bw_azep_o00000_full 
where calday  between to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' ), 'YYYYMMDD')
                  and to_char(date_trunc('month', current_timestamp + interval '9 hours' + interval '1 months') - interval '1 day', 'YYYYMMDD');

properties.description:
- 증분 적재시, 전달+현재 달 파일 Delete후 새로 생성(Copy Activity Sink에서 precopy script로 적용)

- Copy data Current Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Current Month > Sink > Precopy script 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Source > Query 변경 필요
- Copy data Previous Month > Sink > Precopy script 변경 필요

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_ODS.BW_AZEP_O00000_FULL
 WHERE CALMONTH BETWEEN '201907' AND '201912'
